************************************
Welcome to Teaching Kids Programming
************************************

This courseware is made for Professional Developers to teach their own kids to program.
The courseware is designed for kids 10+
You can find out more at: www.teachingkidsprogramming.org

Getting Started:

Start with: SimpleSquare
Set your startup object to SimpleSquare (Project->Properties) 
Translate 1 line at a time
You will be translating the lines out of order (follow the ordering numbered -- #1
